text:
1. Positioning hands on the tabla drums
2. Striking the tabla drums with the fingers
3. Creating different rhythms and patterns by varying the speed and intensity of the strikes
4. Using the heel of the hand to create a bass sound on the larger drum
5. Using the fingertips to create a higher-pitched sound on the smaller drum
6. Maintaining a steady beat and rhythm throughout the performance
7. Incorporating various techniques such as rolls, accents, and slides to add complexity to the playing
8. Syncing with other musicians or instruments if playing in an ensemble or band
9. Expressing emotions and musicality through the dynamic variations and improvisations in the playing.
